name: Macaroni and Cheese
author: S.P.

ingredients.name: c. (8 oz.) sharp process American cheese

instructions: Cook the macaroni in boiling salted water until tender; drain. In saucepan, melt butter; blend in flour, salt and pepper. Add milk; cook and stir until thick and bubbly. Add cheese, cubed, stir until melted. Mix cheese sauce with macaroni. Turn into 1/2 quart casserole. Bake at 350Â° for 35 to 40 minutes, or until heated through.
